<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/staff/queues/{id}/clear/"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This endpoint allows an admin to clear the server queue for a specific location. The user must have an ADMIN rank to access this resource.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={[{"schema":{"type":"string"},"in":"path","name":"id","required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
